Question: Hunan Frecom Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hunan Frecom Electronics Co., Ltd

Product: GaN faster chargers

- Offers a wide range of choices from 18W to 200W
- 22 years of experience in power supply
- Includes open frame battery chargers and standard power adapters from 5W to 150W
- Operates 30 production lines with daily delivery of over 200Kpcs worldwide
- Named as one of the ESG sustainable development companies in 2023
- Products cover a wide range of equipment including servers, new energy devices, household appliances, network communication products, and audio-visual products
Summary_cn:
湖南富康电子有限公司

产品: GaN 更快的充电器

- 提供从18W到200W的广泛选择
- 在电源领域拥有22年经验
- 包括从5W到150W的开放式电池充电器和标准电源适配器
- 运营30条生产线，每天全球交付超过200K个产品
- 被评为2023年ESG可持续发展公司之一
- 产品涵盖了服务器、新能源设备、家用电器、网络通信产品和音视频产品等广泛设备
